1: אֵיכָ֣ה ׀ <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> יָשְׁבָ֣ה <sup>3427 </sup> <n>sit</n> בָדָ֗ד <sup>910 </sup> <n>solitary</n> הָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>How doth the city</n> רַבָּ֣תִי <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[that was] full</n> עָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of people</n> הָיְתָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> כְּאַלְמָנָ֑ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>[how] is she become as a widow</n> רַבָּ֣תִי <sup>7227 </sup> <n>she [that was] great</n> בַגּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the nations</n> שָׂרָ֙תִי֙ <sup>8282 </sup> <n>[and] princess</n> בַּמְּדִינ֔וֹת <sup>4082 </sup> <n>among the provinces</n> הָיְתָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> לָמַֽס׃ <sup>4522 </sup> <n>[how] is she become tributary</n> ס
